description: Van has his hands full in the dungeon with three dirty pigs, Tober Brandt, Kurt Weber, and Xavier St-Jude. He ties them up and lightheartedly plays with them. Van flogs them a bit, but finds them immune to the flogger's meager sting. He then pulls out the cattle prod and the laughing stops. Van still has some animosity towards Tober, so he lets the other boys free to use and abuse him. Tober endures bondage suspension, face-fucking and a hard ass-fucking.
title: Les Trois Petits Cochons
